name: Apple MacBook Air (M2, 2023)
description: The MacBook Air (M2) features Apple's powerful M2 chip, offering exceptional performance, an improved 13.6-inch Liquid Retina display, a larger trackpad, and a new design that is thinner and lighter. It's perfect for everyday tasks, light photo/video editing, and productivity.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 13-inch (M2, 2022)
description: The MacBook Pro 13-inch (M2) delivers powerful performance with the Apple M2 chip. It features a high-quality Retina display, improved battery life, and offers great performance for both work and entertainment.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 14-inch (2023)
description: Powered by the Apple M2 Pro and M2 Max chips, the MacBook Pro 14-inch offers unparalleled performance for professional users. It has a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, great battery life, and an array of ports, making it ideal for intensive creative work, coding, and more.

name: Apple MacBook Pro 16-inch (2023)
description: With the M2 Pro or M2 Max chip, the 16-inch MacBook Pro is designed for professionals needing top-tier performance. It features a massive 16.2-inch Retina display, incredible battery life, and powerful graphics, making it perfect for high-end creative tasks like video editing and 3D rendering.

name: Apple MacBook Air M2 Chip
description: The 15-inch MacBook Air with the M2 chip is the perfect balance of power and portability. It features a larger, stunning Retina display with 500 nits of brightness, making it ideal for productivity and entertainment. The thin, lightweight design is available in four colors: Midnight, Starlight, Space Gray, and Silver. With long battery life and powerful performance, the MacBook Air 15-inch is perfect for daily tasks, creative projects, and light gaming.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book3 15-inch
description: The Samsung Galaxy Book3 15-inch is an ultra-lightweight laptop with a 15.6-inch FHD display. It features the latest Intel Core processors and Intel Iris Xe graphics, making it an excellent option for students, professionals, and casual users. With long battery life, solid build quality, and quick charging, this laptop is designed for everyday computing and multitasking.

name: Samsung Galaxy Book2 Pro 360
description: The Galaxy Book2 Pro 360 offers a 13.3-inch AMOLED touchscreen display with excellent brightness and color accuracy. Powered by the Intel Core i5/i7 processors and Intel Iris Xe graphics, it's great for everyday tasks and light creative work. The 2-in-1 convertible design, ultra-thin body, and long battery life make it ideal for portability and productivity on the go.

name: HP ENVY
description: The HP ENVY 13.3-inch laptop features a sleek design with an Intel Core i5 or i7 processor and Intel Iris Xe graphics. With a stunning FHD display and a solid battery life of up to 11 hours, it’s ideal for daily tasks, productivity, and light creative work. It also includes a fingerprint reader for added security.

name: HP Spectre x360 14-inch
description: The HP Spectre x360 features a 14-inch OLED display with stunning color and clarity. Powered by the Intel Core i7 processor and Intel Iris Xe graphics, it’s designed for performance and portability. The 2-in-1 convertible design, ultra-slim chassis, and long battery life make it perfect for users who need both style and substance.

name: HP Omen 16 Gaming
description: The HP Omen 16 is built for gamers with its 16.1-inch FHD display, NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060/3070 graphics, and Intel Core i7 processor. Designed for high performance, it features fast refresh rates and enhanced cooling systems for intense gaming sessions. The sleek, customizable design and solid battery life make it a top choice for gaming enthusiasts.

name: Apple MacBook M2 Pro Chip
description: The 14-inch MacBook Pro with the new M2 Pro chip offers exceptional performance for professional workflows. It features a stunning Liquid Retina XDR display, ideal for creatives and developers. With longer battery life and faster performance than ever before, it’s designed for heavy-duty tasks like video editing, software development, and more. Available in Space Gray and Silver, it also comes with three Thunderbolt 4 ports, an HDMI port, and an SDXC card slot.

name: Apple MacBook Air (M1, 2020)
description: The MacBook Air (M1) is powered by Apple's first custom silicon chip, delivering impressive performance and battery life. The 13.3-inch Retina display, combined with a thin, fanless design, makes this laptop an excellent choice for those who want a balance of portability and power.

name: iPhone 15
description: The iPhone 15 delivers flagship features at an accessible price. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip, it offers smooth performance and efficiency. The 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display ensures vivid colors and sharp details. With Dynamic Island and a new 48MP main camera, this iPhone is perfect for capturing your life in stunning clarity.

name: iPhone 15 Pro
description: Introducing the iPhone 15 Pro, a marvel of d all-new A17 Pro chip, it offers groundbreaking perfor.

name: iPhone 15 Pro Max
description: Experience the ultimate in smartphone technology with the iPhone 15 Pro Max. Featuring a stunning 6.7-inch Super Retina XDR display, the A17 Pro chip for lightning-fast performance, and an upgraded triple-camera system with 5x telephoto zoom. This device is built with aerospace-grade titanium for unparalleled durability and lightweight design.

name: iPhone 14 Pro
description: The iPhone 14 Pro sets a new standard with its 48MP main camera, always-on 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, and Dynamic Island for smarter interactions. Powered by the A16 Bionic chip, it combines exceptional performance with advanced features like ProRAW and ProMotion for an immersive experience.

name: Xiaomi Redmi Note 13 Pro
description: A mid-range phone offering excellent value: 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. MediaTek Dimensity 7200-Ultra processor for smooth performance. 200 MP primary camera and 16 MP selfie camera. 5100 mAh battery with 67W fast charging.

name: Poco F5
description: A high-performance smartphone for gamers and multitaskers: 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate and Dolby Vision support. Snapdragon 7+ Gen 2 chipset for flagship-level performance. 64 MP primary camera with OIS and 5000 mAh battery. 67W fast charging and LiquidCool Technology 2.0.

name: Xiaomi 12T
description: A premium device for photography enthusiasts: 6.67-inch CrystalRes AMOLED display. MediaTek Dimensity 8100-Ultra processor. 108 MP main camera with 8K video recording. 5000 mAh battery with 120W HyperCharge (100% in 19 minutes).

name: Xiaomi 13 Pro
description: A flagship smartphone with cutting-edge features: 6.73-inch AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset. 50 MP triple-camera system co-engineered with Leica for professional photography. 4820 mAh battery with 120W fast charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy A73 5G
description: A top-tier A-series phone with flagship-like features: 6.7-inch Super AMOLED+ display with 120Hz refresh rate. Snapdragon 778G chipset for smooth performance. 108 MP quad-camera setup for high-resolution photography. 5000 mAh battery with 25W fast charging. Sleek design and water resistance (IP67).

name: Samsung Galaxy A54 5G
description: A mid-range powerhouse with modern features: 6.4-inch Super AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. Exynos 1380 processor for efficient multitasking. 50 MP primary camera with OIS for clear photos and videos. 5000 mAh battery with 25W fast charging. Premium glass back design for durability.

name: Samsung Galaxy A34 5G
description: An affordable option with balanced performance: 6.6-inch Super AMOLED display with 120Hz refresh rate. MediaTek Dimensity 1080 chipset for reliable performance. 48 MP main camera with OIS for detailed photography. 5000 mAh battery with 25W fast charging. Water resistance (IP67) and sleek polycarbonate design.

name: Samsung Galaxy A14 5G
description: A budget-friendly 5G smartphone for everyday use: 6.6-inch PLS LCD display with 90Hz refresh rate. Powered by Exynos 1330 or MediaTek Dimensity 700 chipset. 50 MP primary camera for decent photo quality. 5000 mAh battery with 15W charging. Minimalistic design with a focus on durability.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9
description: A flagship tablet with a compact size for versatile use: 11-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset. 13 MP rear camera and 12 MP front camera. S Pen included for creativity and note-taking. 8400 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9+
description: A premium tablet perfect for entertainment and multitasking: 12.4-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with HDR10+ and 120Hz refresh rate. Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset for powerful multitasking. Dual rear cameras (13 MP + 8 MP) and a 12 MP front camera. S Pen included for precise input. 10090 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S9 Ultra
description: A high-end tablet designed for professionals and creatives: 14.6-inch Dynamic AMOLED 2X display with 120Hz refresh rate. Powered by Snapdragon 8 Gen 2 chipset for ultra-fast performance. Dual-camera setup (13 MP + 8 MP) and 12 MP dual front cameras. S Pen included for productivity and creativity. 11200 mAh battery with 45W fast charging.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10 Ultra
description: A rugged tablet built for outdoor and industrial use: 10.1-inch TFT display with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Powered by Snapdragon 778G chipset for reliable performance. 13 MP rear camera and 8 MP front camera. Military-grade durability (MIL-STD-810H) with water and dust resistance (IP68). S Pen included, designed for tough environments.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S10+
description: An affordable tablet for casual use and learning: 10.5-inch TFT display with 1920 x 1200 resolution. Unisoc T618 processor for smooth daily performance. 8 MP rear camera and 5 MP front camera. 7040 mAh battery with 15W fast charging. Slim design and Dolby Atmos support for immersive audio.

name: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 Ultra
description: A flagship tablet designed for power users and professionals: 14.6-inch Super AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, offering vibrant colors and smooth visuals. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Gen 1 chipset, ensuring seamless multitasking and gaming. Dual 13 MP + 6 MP rear cameras and dual 12 MP front cameras for high-quality photography and video calls. 11200 mAh battery with 45W fast charging for extended use and quick recharge. Slim, lightweight design with premium materials for a modern and durable finish. Included S Pen with ultra-low latency for precise writing, drawing, and productivity tasks.

name: iPad Pro 12.9-inch (M2, 2023)
description: A premium tablet powered by the M2 chip, featuring a Liquid Retina XDR display, Apple Pencil hover functionality, and Magic Keyboard support. Perfect for professionals and creatives.

name: iPad Pro 11-inch (M2, 2023)
description: The 11-inch iPad Pro offers exceptional performance with the M2 chip, ProMotion technology, and ultra-wide cameras. Compact yet powerful for productivity and entertainment.

name: iPad Air (5th Generation)
description: A powerful tablet featuring a 10.9-inch Liquid Retina display, M1 chip, and support for Apple Pencil and Magic Keyboard. Ideal for both students and professionals.
